snippet: Alabama quarterback A J McCarron won the Maxwell Award, given to college football’s player of the year.
abstract: Alabama quarterback A J McCarron wins the Maxwell Award, given to college football’s player of the year; he led Alabama to an 11-1 season that left it just short of a chance to play for its third straight national championship.
lead_paragraph: Alabama quarterback A J McCarron won the Maxwell Award, given to college football’s player of the year.
